overview:
A mobile evangelist. 10 years in the mobile, advertising & content sector. Starting a successful content production company MercuryBoy inc in 2001, also opened an interactive division MercuryGirl 2009. Amalgamated into MercuryDigital in 2011 , a full service interactive Digital agency with an outstanding team, portfolio of work and clients. Now an executive board member of Mercury and focused on Skynet labs.

Opened Skynet Labs 2012. Skynet creates software for the oil and gas industry. We focus on centralizing all drilling and completions related calculations and conversions into one cloud and multidevice accessible dashboard. Our solution is currently in a working beta phase and we are looking for test users for the iPhone, iPad and Android beta.

Specialties Providing strategy and tech solutions for business that require guidance in web and mobile software. Business Development Full life cycle management for multi-platform mobile and web applications. Mobile and web business strategy, consultancy & development Video and online content
